internships.about: We are a mobile and web development company. We're a professional, individualistic one-stop shop providing strategic brand consulting, experience and customer journey design, mobile app design and development, website and software development, and just about everything else which has to do anything with digital technology
requirements: Someone who can work in a fast-paced startup environment
Good understanding of ReactJs, HTML, SCSS (styling is important), Javascript
Good communication is a must-have for this role
Hardworking & Curious to learn/implement new things is what I prefer personally
responsibilities: Write clean, manageable code and follow standard coding practices
Write quality code with a clean UI/UX view
Work with the tech & non-tech teams to create a meaningful product for users
Capable to build a feature, testing, and deploying a feature on the production server

internships.about: We are a data-driven company specializing in advanced analytics and insights. We help businesses make data-informed decisions and leverage the power of data science to drive growth and innovation.
requirements: Strong programming skills in Python
Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and techniques
Experience with data analysis and visualization
Good communication and problem-solving skills
responsibilities: Analyze and interpret complex data sets
Build and train predictive models
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop data-driven solutions
Present findings and insights to stakeholders

internships.about: We are a full-service marketing agency helping businesses build their online presence and reach their target audience effectively. Our expertise includes social media marketing, search engine optimization, content creation, and data-driven strategies.
requirements: Familiarity with popular social media platforms
Basic understanding of SEO principles
Proficiency in Google Analytics or similar tools
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
responsibilities: Manage social media accounts and campaigns
Optimize website content for search engines
Track and analyze marketing metrics
Create engaging and relevant content for various platforms

internships.about: We are a creative design studio specializing in visual communication and branding. Our team is passionate about creating unique and impactful designs that resonate with our clients' target audience.
requirements: Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.)
Strong understanding of graphic design principles
Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics
Ability to work collaboratively in a team
responsibilities: Create visual assets for various projects
Develop and execute design concepts
Collaborate with the design team to meet client requirements
Maintain design files and assets

internships.about: We are a content agency specializing in creating engaging and compelling content for various industries. Our team of talented writers and editors ensures that our clients' content stands out and effectively communicates their brand message.
requirements: Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong grasp of grammar and writing style
Familiarity with SEO best practices
Ability to conduct thorough research
responsibilities: Write and edit content for different platforms (blogs, websites, social media, etc.)
Optimize content for search engines
Conduct research on industry-related topics
Collaborate with the content team to meet deadlines

internships.about: We are a fast-growing startup focused on disrupting the industry with our innovative products. As a business development intern, you will have the opportunity to contribute to our growth by identifying new business opportunities and building relationships with potential clients.
requirements: Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Ability to conduct market research and identify potential leads
Interest in technology and startups
Self-motivated and results-oriented
responsibilities: Conduct market research to identify potential clients and market trends
Generate leads and cold-call/email potential prospects
Assist in developing and implementing sales strategies
Collaborate with the sales team to achieve targets

internships.about: We are a digital agency specializing in user-centered design solutions. Our talented team of designers creates intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that enhance user experiences across various platforms.
requirements: Proficiency in UI/UX design tools (e.g., Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma)
Understanding of design principles and best practices
Ability to create wireframes and prototypes
Attention to detail and a passion for creating beautiful designs
responsibilities: Create user interface designs for web and mobile applications
Develop wireframes and interactive prototypes
Collaborate with the design and development teams to implement designs
Conduct user research and usability testing

internships.about: We are a leading corporation with a diverse workforce. As an HR intern, you will gain hands-on experience in various HR functions and contribute to creating a positive work environment for our employees.
requirements: Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Basic knowledge of HR policies and practices
Ability to maintain confidentiality
Attention to detail and organizational skills
responsibilities: Assist in recruitment processes, including sourcing and screening candidates
Coordinate employee onboarding and orientation
Maintain HR records and databases
Assist in employee relations activities

internships.about: We are a tech solutions company specializing in mobile app development for Android and iOS platforms. Join our dynamic team to work on exciting projects and gain practical experience in building innovative mobile applications.
requirements: Knowledge of Android app development (Java/Kotlin) or iOS app development (Swift)
Familiarity with mobile development frameworks and tools
Passion for creating user-friendly and visually appealing apps
Ability to work collaboratively in a team
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications for Android or iOS platforms
Collaborate with the development team to implement features and enhancements
Perform testing and debugging of mobile apps
Stay updated with the latest mobile development trends and best practices

internships.about: We are a financial services company providing comprehensive solutions to our clients. Join our finance team as an intern to gain practical experience in financial analysis, accounting, and financial modeling.
requirements: Basic knowledge of financial analysis and accounting principles
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Attention to detail and ability to work with numbers
responsibilities: Assist in financial analysis and reporting
Perform data entry and maintain financial records
Assist in financial modeling and forecasting
Support the finance team in day-to-day tasks
